name: Wererat (Lycanthrope)
movement: 30 ft., swim 30 ft. in rat or hybrid form
description: The Wererat is a Medium humanoid characterized by its ability to shapeshift into a rat or hybrid form. This creature is agile with a dexterous appearance suitable for sneaking through urban environments and sewers. It has a cunning demeanor and a mix of feral and humanoid traits, often using short swords and crossbows in combat.
memorable: Unique ability to spread lycanthropy through its bite, adding a layer of threat to encounters.
goals: Engage in thievery, sabotage, and build criminal networks.
relations: Often found in gangs or associated with other urban criminals, may have ties to other lycanthropes.
environment: Typically found in urban environments or sewers.
strengths: Exceptional stealth and tactical advantage through Pack Tactics; immunity to damage from non-silvered weapons.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to wolfsbane, which can incapacitate it and amplify damage from non-silvered weapons.
attacks: Uses claws, a shortsword, or a hand crossbow with reliable accuracy; can also inflict lycanthropy through bite.
most_powerful_ability: Pack Tactics grants advantage on attack rolls against a target when near an ally.
senses: Possesses heightened perception with advantage on checks that rely on smell, allowing it to effectively detect creatures or food.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, making it a formidable ambusher.
additional_information: Can shapeshift into rat or hybrid forms.
Works well in groups, benefiting from surrounding allies.
Can make a Frenzied Bite attack when bloodied.
Heightened sense of smell increases its Perception to 17.
Relies on stealth and cunning rather than brute strength.
test_queries: cunning humanoid that can become a rat
